about_the_game:
This soundtrack features all 23 songs found in Siralim 2 as 320kbps MP3 files. The track list is as follows:

1. Communion
2. New Siralim
3. To Arms!
4. The Deciding Battle
5. God of Revolution
6. Victory
7. Game Over
8. Arachnid Nest
9. Azure Dream
10. The Barrens
11. Cutthroat Jungle
12. Eternity's End
13. Faraway Enclave
14. Frostbite Caverns
15. Great Pandemonium
16. Kingdom of Heretics
17. Path of the Damned
18. Refuge of the Magi
19. The Swamplands
20. Torture Chamber
21. Unsullied Meadows
22. Where the Dead Ships Dwell
23. Trials of the Gods

All of these songs were created by Tim Bongiovanni of Northgate Productions.
